Name: Apis
Description: This votive statuette represents the Apis bull. This procreative god, incarnated in a live animal, had a cult centre next to the temple of Ptah at Memphis. He wears a solar disk provided with a uraeus between the horns. His back is covered with a winged scarab, a decorative blanket. and a vulture with its wings spread out. The written inscription on the base is totally erased.
